name: docs-test
description: A multi-version, multi-product, multi-platform documentation site built with [Docsify](https://docsify.js.org/) and hosted on GitHub Pages.

scripts.postinstall: NPM_MOD="function npm_for_docs() { if [[ \"\$1\" == \"preview\" ]]; then command npm run preview; exit 0; else npm \"\$@\"; fi }; alias npm=npm_for_docs; alias preview='cd \"$(pwd)\" && command npm run preview'" && echo "$NPM_MOD" >> "$HOME/.bash_profile" && eval "$NPM_MOD"
